This page lists refereed publications, preprints, and links to DOI and DBLP entries when available.

Journals

  • [Author et al., 20XX] — Paper title. Journal name. DOI • DBLP

Conferences

  • [Author et al., 20XX] — Paper title. Conference name. DOI • DBLP

Preprints

  • [Author et al., 20XX] — Preprint title. arXiv

To populate this list with your publications, provide a bibliographic file (_data/publications.yml) or send me a list (title, authors, venue, year, DOI, DBLP link) and I’ll add them in a consistent template.
